name: phantom memoirs
description:
"phantom memoirs" is a video assemblage and afterlife manifest: a process of redemption for all denied memories. 

immigration documents of relatives who had their narratives marked by diasporas and historical conflicts are implanted by a sewing machine in a meta-body constructed through MRI.

the transgenerational trauma that keeps haunting us, in which even without being able to see, we can still constantly feel.

in our blood; 
in our bones; 
in our being.

dimension: 720 x 1280 px
duration: 10s @30 fps
format: MP4 with sound
